00147 inline void 
00148 isabBoxRouteReq::setRouteData( int32 origLat,
00149                                int32 origLon,
00150                                int32 destLat,
00151                                int32 destLon,
00152                                uint16 startAngle )

00161 
00162 inline void 
00163 isabBoxRouteReq::setRouteReqHeader( uint8 protoVer,
00164                                     uint32 navID,
00165                                     uint32 userID,
00166                                     const char* userName )
00167 {
00168    m_protoVer = protoVer;
00169    if ( m_protoVer > 0 ) {
00170       setNavID( navID );
00171    }
00172    if ( m_protoVer == 1 ) {
00173       setUserID( userID );
00174    }
00175    if ( m_protoVer > 1 ) {
00176       setUserName( (byte*)userName );
00177    }
00178 }
